quote.registrar: Computershare Hong Kong Investor Services Ltd.
quote.issuer_name: Beijing Jingneng Clean Energy Co., Ltd. - H Shares
quote.nm: Beijing Jingneng Clean Energy Co., Ltd. - H Shares
quote.summary: Beijing Jingneng Clean Energy Co Ltd is a China-based company mainly engaged in power-related businesses. The Company's business involves diversified clean energy power generation businesses such as gas-fired power generation and heating, wind power, small and medium-sized hydropower and other clean energy. The Company produces and sells electric power to external customers through four segments. The Gas-fired Power and Heat Energy segment constructs, manages and operates natural gas-fired power plants and produces electric power and heat energy. The Wind Power segment constructs, manages and operates wind power plants and produces electric power. The Photovoltaic Power segment constructs, manages and operates photovoltaic power plants and produces electric power. The Hydropower segment manages and operates hydropower stations and sells electric power to external customers.
